CustomSearchEngine.keywords: anime manga wikipedia news review reviews criticism reliable sources
CustomSearchEngine.Title: Wikipedia RSs for anime/manga
CustomSearchEngine.Description:
Runs site searches on everything in http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:WikiProject_Anime_and_manga/Online_reliable_sources and other mainstream sources (>341 domains). Includes a thorough blacklist of >4202 domains.
For video game searches, https://www.google.com/cse/home?cx=003516479746865699832:leawcwkqifq may be useful. (I do not maintain it.)
This CSE is maintained by gwern (http://www.gwern.net). The exported black/whitelist of this CSE is available at http://www.gwern.net/docs/gwern-google-cse.xml and is synced every 3 months, for those who wish to debug it or create their own version.
